name: VR Dinosaur Village
description:
This is an exciting VR casual game that allows players to experience the fun of dinosaur breeding in person. In this virtual real world, you will become a dinosaur farmeter to cultivate huge dinosaurs and earn money by planting plants and fishing and feeding dinosaurs.



The core gameplay of the game is planting and feeding dinosaurs. You will have a piece of land, and you can plant various plants on it. You can choose different seeds, such as vegetables, fruits and grass. You can also use fishing rods for fishing. Different types of dinosaurs have different food habits. Therefore, you need to choose proper feed according to the dinosaur's dietary habits. When sowing seeds, you also need to water and fertilize them to ensure that they grow up healthy and rapid.



Breeding grassy dinosaurs need to be fed with planting plants. When your plant grows mature, you can pick them and feed them to dinosaurs. To feed meat dinosaurs, you need to use a fishing rod to capture fish in the lake and feed dinosaurs.
When you successfully raise dinosaurs, you can sell them and get money rewards. Money is the key to unlock more seeds, props and dinosaur seedlings. You can buy new seeds in the store through money, plant more varieties of plants, and further enrich your farm experience.
In short, this game brings the fun of dinosaur breeding to your fingertips through exquisite graphics and real virtual reality experience. You can not only relax your body and mind, but also cultivate your own planting skills, and feel the sense of accomplishment of becoming a dinosaur farmers. Come and join this fun and creative farm world and start your unique dinosaur breeding journey!



Operation method:
Feed herbivorous dinosaurs with plants
Feed carnivorous dinosaurs with fish Caught in lake
Walk left handle up/down/left/right
Turn right handle left/right
Use ltem right handle trigger
Cancel right handle grip
Reset Position left handle grip
Show/Hide Hud left/right handle menu
